BugInstance.message: Boxing/unboxing to parse a primitive org.apache.atlas.Atlas.getApplicationPort(CommandLine, String, Configuration)
Load of known null value in org.apache.atlas.examples.QuickStart.search()
org.apache.atlas.examples.QuickStartV2.TYPES should be package protected
Load of known null value in org.apache.atlas.examples.QuickStartV2.search()
Class org.apache.atlas.notification.NotificationHookConsumer$HookConsumer$1 defines non-transient non-serializable instance field this$1
Class org.apache.atlas.notification.NotificationHookConsumer$HookConsumer$1 defines non-transient non-serializable instance field val$partialUpdateRequest
Class org.apache.atlas.notification.NotificationHookConsumer$HookConsumer$2 defines non-transient non-serializable instance field this$1
Class org.apache.atlas.notification.NotificationHookConsumer$HookConsumer$2 defines non-transient non-serializable instance field val$deleteRequest
org.apache.atlas.util.CredentialProviderUtility.textDevice isn't final but should be
HTTP parameter directly written to HTTP header output in org.apache.atlas.web.filters.ActiveServerFilter.handleRedirect(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse, String)
org.apache.atlas.web.filters.AtlasAuthenticationFilter.nullContext isn't final but should be
Possible null pointer dereference of AtlasAuthenticationFilter.configuration in org.apache.atlas.web.filters.AtlasAuthenticationFilter.getConfiguration(String, FilterConfig)
Class org.apache.atlas.web.filters.SSOAuthentication defines non-transient non-serializable instance field token
org.apache.atlas.web.filters.SSOAuthenticationProperties.getUserAgentList() may expose internal representation by returning SSOAuthenticationProperties.userAgentList

org.apache.atlas.web.filters.SSOAuthenticationProperties.setUserAgentList(String[]) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into SSOAuthenticationProperties.userAgentList
Unread public/protected field: org.apache.atlas.web.resources.BaseService$Results.href
Unread public/protected field: org.apache.atlas.web.resources.BaseService$Results.status
Boxing/unboxing to parse a primitive org.apache.atlas.web.resources.MetadataDiscoveryResource.validateQueryParams(int, int)

Write to static field org.apache.atlas.web.resources.MetadataDiscoveryResource.applicationProperties from instance method new org.apache.atlas.web.resources.MetadataDiscoveryResource(DiscoveryService, Configuration)
Write to static field org.apache.atlas.web.resources.TypesResource.typeRegistry from instance method new org.apache.atlas.web.resources.TypesResource(AtlasTypeRegistry, TypesREST, AtlasTypeDefStore)
Return value of java.util.Collections.singleton(Object) ignored, but method has no side effect
org.apache.atlas.web.util.LineageUtils.toLineageStruct(AtlasLineageInfo, AtlasTypeRegistry) makes inefficient use of keySet iterator instead of entrySet iterator
